entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 2.
